#summary Directory of Hackystat services and systems.

The following table provides information on all currently released Hackystat tools and services. 

|| *Category* || *Name* || *Project Home Page* || *Links* || *Description* ||
|| Sensor || Ant Build Sensor || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/ hackystat-sensor-ant] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/UserGuide User Guide], [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/AntSensorTasksReference Ant Task Reference] || Collects Build sensor data from [http://ant.apache.org Ant]. ||
|| Sensor || Checkstyle Sensor || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/ hackystat-sensor-ant] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/UserGuide User Guide], [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/AntSensorTasksReference Ant Task Reference] || Collects !CodeIssue sensor data from [http://checkstyle.sourceforge.net Checkstyle]. ||
|| Sensor || Clover Sensor || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/ hackystat-sensor-ant] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/UserGuide User Guide], [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/AntSensorTasksReference Ant Task Reference] || Collects Coverage sensor data from [http://www.atlassian.com/software/clover/ Clover]. ||
|| Sensor || Emacs Sensor || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-emacs/ hackystat-sensor-emacs] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-emacs/wiki/UserGuide User Guide] || Collects !DevEvent sensor data from [http://www.gnu.org/software/emacs Emacs]. ||
|| Sensor || Eclipse Sensor || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-eclipse/ hackystat-sensor-eclipse] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-eclipse/wiki/UserGuide User Guide] || Collects !DevEvent sensor data from [http://www.eclipse.org Eclipse]. ||
|| Sensor || Emma Sensor || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/ hackystat-sensor-ant] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/UserGuide User Guide], [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/AntSensorTasksReference Ant Task Reference] || Collects Coverage sensor data from [http://emma.sourceforge.net Emma]. ||
|| Sensor || !FindBugs Sensor || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/ hackystat-sensor-ant] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/UserGuide User Guide], [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/AntSensorTasksReference Ant Task Reference] || Collects !CodeIssue sensor data from [http://findbugs.sourceforge.net FindBugs]. ||

|| Sensor || PMD Sensor || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/ hackystat-sensor-ant] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/UserGuide User Guide], [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/AntSensorTasksReference Ant Task Reference] || Collects !CodeIssue sensor data from [http://pmd.sourceforge.net PMD]. ||
|| Sensor || Subversion Sensor || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/ hackystat-sensor-ant] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/UserGuide User Guide], [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-ant/wiki/AntSensorTasksReference Ant Task Reference] || Collects Commit sensor data from [http://subversion.tigris.org Subversion]. ||

|| Sensor || !SensorShell || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-shell/ hackystat-sensor-shell] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-shell/wiki/UserGuide User Guide] || "Middleware" for Hackystat sensor data transmission. ||
|| Sensor || Vim || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-vim/ hackystat-sensor-vim] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensor-vim/wiki/UserGuide User Guide] || Collects !DevEvent sensor data from [http://www.vim.org Vim]. ||

|| User Interface || Project Viewer || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-ui-projectviewer2/ hackystat-ui-projectviewer2] || (Documentation not yet available) || Provides support for creating, managing, and viewing project definitions. ||
|| User Interface || Telemetry Viewer || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-ui-telemetryviewer/ hackystat-ui-telemetryviewer] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-ui-telemetryviewer/wiki/UserGuide User Guide] || Provides a visual interface to telemetry charts. ||
|| Repository || Sensorbase || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensorbase-uh/ hackystat-sensorbase-uh] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensorbase-uh/wiki/UserGuide User Guide], [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensorbase-uh/wiki/RestApiSpecification REST API] || Storage for sensor data, sensor data types, users, and projects. ||
|| Analysis || Daily Project Data || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-analysis-dailyprojectdata/ hackystat-analysis-dailyprojectdata] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-analysis-dailyprojectdata/wiki/UserGuide User Guide], [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-analysis-dailyprojectdata/wiki/RestApiSpecification REST API] || Provides abstractions of sensor data for a given project and day. ||
|| Analysis || Telemetry || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-analysis-telemetry/ hackystat-analysis-telemetry] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-analysis-telemetry/wiki/UserGuide User Guide], [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-analysis-telemetry/wiki/RestApiSpecification REST API] || Provides abstractions of project trends over time. ||
|| Analysis || SDSA || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-analysis-sdsa/ hackystat-analysis-sdsa] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-analysis-sdsa/wiki/UserGuide User Guide], [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-analysis-sdsa/wiki/RestApiSpecification REST API] || Provides an abstraction called Software Development Stream Analysis. ||
|| Analysis || Project Trajectory || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-analysis-projecttrajectory/ hackystat-analysis-projecttrajectory] || (No documentation available) || Creates size and effort summaries for projects. (Under development.)   ||
|| Utilities || Core Utilities || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-utilities/ hackystat-utilities] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-utilities/wiki/UserGuide User Guide] || Utilities including !HackystatLogger, Tstamp, !StackTrace, and !UriCache. ||
|| Utilities || SimData || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensorbase-simdata/ hackystat-sensorbase-simdata] || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-sensorbase-simdata/wiki/DeveloperGuide Developer Guide] || Provides facilities for creation of "simulated" sensor data. ||
|| Utilities || System Status || [http://code.google.com/p/hackystat-ui-systemstatus/ hackystat-ui-systemstatus] || (Documentation not yet available.) || Support for assessment of service status, such as !PingMail. ||
